title: Site loads without errors after dependency upgrades
description: Verify that the DevBrows Portfolio Site loads fully without npm installation errors or runtime errors after upgrading dependencies including 'vaul'.

steps.description: Pull latest code with upgraded dependencies
Run 'npm install' to install dependencies
Run development server using 'npm run dev'
Check that no errors occurred during 'npm install'
Check that the development server starts and site loads without runtime errors

title: Theme toggle functionality with black and purple palette
description: Verify that toggling the theme switch correctly applies the black and purple color scheme consistently across all UI components in both light and dark modes.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page
Check the initial theme (light or dark) matches the black and purple palette
Click on the theme toggle control
Verify that the theme switches to the opposite mode
Validate color palette changes appropriately with black and purple colors applied
Toggle theme multiple times to verify stability and no visual glitches
Confirm all UI components update their styling accordingly on each toggle

title: Navigation and rendering of all landing page sections
description: Verify that all main sections (About, Services, Work, Contact) and footer render properly, and users can navigate through them by scrolling with smooth reveal animations.

steps.description: Load the home page
Check that the About section is visible
Scroll down to the Services section
Confirm Services section content is properly rendered and visible
Continue scrolling to the Work section
Ensure Work section is loaded and visible with portfolio items
Scroll further to the Contact section
Verify Contact section with social media icons and contact info is fully visible
Scroll to the footer
Check fixed footer is present with DevBrows link
Observe that reveal animations trigger smoothly during scrolling

title: Social media icons open correct hardcoded URLs in new tabs
description: Test that the social media icons in the Contact section open their designated hardcoded URLs in new browser tabs/windows.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact section
Click on each social media icon one by one
Verify that a new browser tab opens for each click
Confirm the opened URL matches the expected hardcoded social media URL
Check that clicking multiple icons opens multiple tabs correctly without blocking popups

title: UI components function visually and interactively per Radix UI patterns
description: Validate functional and visual behavior of reusable UI components such as buttons, dialogs, forms, navigation, carousel, calendar, toast notifications, etc. built on Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.

steps.description: Navigate through the site to locate and interact with UI components: buttons, dialogs, forms, carousel, calendar
Click buttons and verify expected behaviors
Open dialogs and verify focus management and keyboard navigation
Fill form inputs with valid and invalid data and submit
Confirm UI feedback and validation messages appear correctly
Trigger toast notifications and verify timely appearance and dismissal
Test carousel interactions (next, previous, swipe) and verify content changes
Check calendar component selection and display
Validate all components visually conform to black and purple theme and respond to interactions

title: Custom hooks trigger expected behaviors
description: Test custom React hooks: use-mobile for device detection, use-reveal for scroll/visibility animations, and use-toast for toast notifications behave as intended.

steps.description: Simulate device types (mobile and desktop) and verify use-mobile detects device correctly
Scroll through page to activate use-reveal hooks
Confirm elements reveal smoothly on scroll as expected
Trigger toast notifications via UI or programmatic invocation
Check that toast notifications appear and dismiss correctly using use-toast hook

title: Fixed footer presence and external DevBrows link validation
description: Verify the footer remains fixed and full width at the bottom, includes the DevBrows attribution link which opens externally in a new tab.

steps.description: Load home page and scroll to bottom
Verify that footer remains visible and fixed regardless of scroll position
Check footer spans full width of the viewport
Click on the DevBrows link in the footer
Confirm the link opens in a new tab
Verify the URL of the opened tab is the correct external DevBrows site

title: Utility function class merging correctness
description: Test the utility function that merges class names to ensure correct concatenation and override behavior for dynamic styling.

steps.description: Invoke class merging utility with various class name inputs including duplicates, conditional classes, and conflicting styles
Verify the output string contains all expected classes merged correctly without duplicates
Check that conditional classes are included or excluded as intended

title: Accessibility checks on UI components and custom UI elements
description: Confirm UI components and custom elements like custom cursor, magnetic buttons, and grain overlays comply with accessibility standards including keyboard navigation and ARIA attributes.

steps.description: Navigate UI components using keyboard only (tab, shift+tab, enter, space)
Ensure focus outlines are visible and navigation order is logical
Use screen reader tools to inspect ARIA attributes and element roles
Validate ARIA roles and labels are present and accurate on dialogs, buttons, forms
Test interactive custom elements like magnetic buttons and cursors for predictable behavior
Confirm no keyboard traps or visual glitches occur
